While everything went right for you, something went wrong for me. In your world Dad was your best friend, playing catch with you. In your world, Uncle Ralph got you a whore for your 14th birthday. In my world for my 14th birthday he raped me. I have been looking all over for my birthday girl!" She looked at you, "You have been crying!" She looked over her shoulder and all around. "Let's get you cleaned up."

She did get a wash cloth though, and as she washed your face she said, "Eve. What did you do? I mean, to get your uncle to leave?"

She shook her head, "Sweetheart. You have nothing to fear from me. Nobody knows better than me how your dad's family treats females. I hated to need to leave to get groceries. To be honest, I was afraid that he would rape you while I was gone."

The present turned out to be a lavender sundress. You sighed, but knew that you might as well get used to dressing like a girl until you figured out how to get your own life back. I got used to other things too. I had my first period since becoming Eve. That was gross! I had no choice but to learn how to tolerate it though. And the more time that passed, the less I minded the feeling of my breasts or the need to sit down to pee. Eventually, I hardly thought about it.

Joel kept his promise, and introduced me to his martial arts instructors. They were hesitant to include a girl at first, but I convinced them that a girl had as much right to learn how to fight as a boy, and probably greater need! As it turned out, I ended up being one of their star pupils. That was easy. Any time I had to attack a training dummy, all I had to do was imagine it was my uncle, and I had all of the motivation I needed!

One thing was sure, in the now two months since getting stuck in this body, I had set Eve's life on a better path already.
15533212112.title: At Joel's house

choices: Was that me in the mirror?
155332121121.content:
It was different going back to school as a girl. Not because I felt odd as a girl anymore. I was so used to having breasts and a pussy that it was getting harder and harder to remember what being a male felt like. I had even long passed the point where I expected to see any face in the mirror each morning other than the female one I had become accustomed to. What was different was that, now, most of my friends were girls. And while all the people were the same in my memory, our relationships were different. Some guys I had hung out with as a guy seemed like sexist jerks to me as a girl. And some girls that I had thought of as cute or sexy were now friends, and I had no attraction for them at all.

I soon began to realize the different way I was treated. Sometimes I felt like I had entered a different social class now, and not for the better. What got me through those first days was being Joel's girlfriend. He was my anchor. If anything, those early days drove me even closer to Joel than I would have thought possible! There was soon no question in the minds of the other students that I was not available, so guys bugged me less.

One evening, after school, Joel said, "You do want to go to the dance with me, right?"

I giggled, "Oh Joel! Who else would I go with?" I leaned in and we kissed, and something in me changed at that moment. Part of me wanted to fight it, but how could I? I broke the kiss and whispered into Joel's ear, "I love you Joel!"

He squeezed me tighter, "I love you to Eve." And my heart leapt for joy!
155332121121.title: School Starts

1553321211212.content:
I sill wanted to get back to my life as a male, but I had to admit, I now had a new perspective on my female life here Maybe it was only natural in more than one way that I had fallen in love with Joel. After all, he was my best friend in my male life. I still remembered that life, but the strange thing was that Eve life, at least, her life as it was in the future, was fading. I took it as a good sign that I had made significant moves in changing Eve's life for the better. The odd thing was that I was starting to enjoy it myself. I was getting very used to being female. Perhaps nothing was more proof than the fact that I was staring at myself in the mirror, wearing a dress, and all I could think of was how I hoped that Joel would find me pretty. I spun, Loving the feel of the air rushing under my skirt as I smiled at the thought of Joel.

Joel looked very handsome when he picked me up. Yes. Handsome. I had overcome my shyness at being attracted to males. Why shouldn't I be? I was a female as long as I was in this body.I was almost giddy to be with him that night. And it was a wonderful night! We danced, ate, danced and danced again! When he walked me home, we had a long, passionate kiss on my doorstep. And when he did kiss me that way, I didn't resist the thoughts of love and marriage that I started to have concerning Joel.

Weeks turned into months. And as time passed, the female things of this life began to become the norm. I never gave a second thought anymore to things that used to bother me. Things like sitting down to pee, having breasts, and wearing dresses, were all just normal. I even was as used to my periods now. Well, as used as any girl could be I suppose. And I even loved being with my female friends. I had learned that it was very different. Girls became much closer and deeper friends than guys every were. On the flip side, they also were terribly vindictive if that friendship was broken, and cruel beyond belief if they thought the betrayal warranted it. I made my best effort not to take part in the feuds, but school girls seemed unusually insistent that, to be a friend, you had to take sides. Then something happened that helped to change that. Well, for me at least.

One morning, as I was walking to my gym class, I passed the restrooms. Nothing odd there, except that I heard a strange sound come from the boy's restroom. I might have kept going, but that strange sound seemed like it came from a girl. I paused, and heard something muffled again. I had a bad feeling about this. I put my things down and edged to the door. I peeked in and could hear a struggle deeper. I took a deep breath and went in. It was a testimony to how normal I now felt as a female that I felt it odd, even wrong, to be going into the boy's bathroom. When I turned the corner, I saw what had caused the noise. One of the girls that was considered a bit to be avoided, Shelley, was pinned against the wall by two boys. One was already groping her breast, and I was sure that was only the start.

I braced myself and said, "Stop that and let her go! Now!"

They turned, surprised at first, but then laughed, They were bigger guys from the football squad. The sight of this little girl telling them what to do was amusing to them. The first one, Craig, looked at the second and said, "You take her. I will take this new one. Maybe even get her knocked up."

He left Shelley and came to me. As he reached to grab me, my training kicked in. I knocked the wind out of him and before he knew what was happening, he was laying on the floor gasping for air. His friend Jeff let go of Shelley and he leapt at me. I knew that if he got a hold on me my chances would go down. His size and weight advantage would be more than my current level of training would be able to overcome. Fortunately for me, his mass committed him to a straight line, and I was agile enough to dodge him quickly. He ran into the wall behind me. He recovered and turned around just in time for me to use a round-house kick on him. He went down like a rock!

I looked at Shelley, "Don't just stand there! Get out of here! Quick!" I guarded her retreat and then ran out myself, grabbing my things as I did. I had to stop Shelley from running to hid in the girl's room, "No! Not there! They might come in after us! This way!" I didn't want to be caught again in a confined space. I was lucky the first time because of the element of surprise, but I didn't think I could handle both of those guys at once, least of all in a tight space. However, I saw a class going on, and the door was open, "In here! Quick!"

Needless to say, the teacher was shocked and upset when we came running into his class. That is, until he heard enough of our story to run out and catch the boys coming out of the restroom. He grabbed them and took them to the office, calling on us to come behind. Once there, he drug them into the principle's office while he told the secretary what happened and to take us to the nurse.

It was a complicated time fore a while after that. I had to explain what happened to a lot of people. However, in the long run, it was great. For one thing, between my action, and Joel making it clear that anyone so much as bumping into me would have to answer to him. Also, whether I wanted her or not, Shelley was now my new best friend. Or, at least, I was hers. That was good, because, with her help, we convinced the school administration to allow us to start a self-defense club for girls. An almost heretical idea in that time. I was able to convince one of the female teachers to sponsor us, and get one of my instructors to come in once a week. To most girls in the school, I was suddenly a hero.

It was nice to be popular, but in all this, the thing I enjoyed the most was my time with Joel. By the end of the school year, we were inseparable, and I was beginning to enjoy this new life.
1553321211212.title: Was that me in the mirror?

choices: She asks you to tell her what you want as a reward
She calls the police to have your uncle arrested
She decides to kick your uncle out of the house
155332122.content:
You enter the house cautiously, timidly. You would rather avoid another confrontation, in case your uncle still has ideas. You find him sitting on the couch in the living room, seeming to have sobered up, holding what looks like a glass of water and staring down at it. Hearing you, he looks up. You stop, and take a step back, ready to flee if he makes a move. But he flinches when he sees you, and moves away to the side of the couch farthest from you.

You pass by cautiously, keeping an eye on him as he watches you, except he's watching you with a deer-in-the-headlights look, which is unexpected. You glare at him, and he flinches fearfully and shrinks back, trembling slightly. It looks like he's actually afraid of you. Which is fine, you don't want anything to do with him.

You go to head up the stairs to go to your room. The room Eve has is the same as your room was at the same age, though with no decorations and a lighter color scheme. You lock the door (just in case) and sit on your bed, focusing on going through the original Eve's memories. You remember them just as vividly as your own, as if you had lived them yourself. Oddly, you have the memories of the adult Eve who had spoken to you, memories from after the time you ended up. Thinking through them, you see that the original Eve’s rape was both the worst event of her life and the start of her life going downhill. Prior to this day, she had been kind and innocent, albeit neglected by her father (as she had told you). The rape had left her traumatized and miserable. She had ended up dropping in and out of school, going on and off drugs, and ended up in a minimum wage job and suffering from trauma and depression. By preventing the rape, hopefully the original Eve will have a better life - if she’s willing to take her life back.

You're interrupted by the sound of a knock on your door and your mother's voice calling "Eve?" From the original Eve's memories, her/your mother had treated her kindly; it simply hadn't been enough. You open the door and your mother gives you a quick hug. "There's my birthday girl!" Then she gets a good look at your face. You know that it's obvious you're upset and have been crying, and she recognizes it. "Eve, what's wrong?" she asks.

It takes you a few seconds to reply. "It... Uncle Bobby, he... he tried to..." you pause, and your mom looks at you.

"What did he do?" she asks, and you take a breath to calm yourself.

"He... he tried to... he tried to rape me..."

"He what?!" she snaps angrily.

"I... I stopped him, but..." you trail off as your mother looks at you.

"You stopped him?" she asks incredulously. "How did you manage that?"

"I, well..." you sigh. "I was in the bathroom, and..." you tell her everything that happened from when your uncle forced the door open to returning and finding him afraid of you. When you finish, your mother smiles and pulls you into a hug.

"Eve my brave brave girl!" she says. "Good for you!"
155332122.title: Uncle Boby was actually afraid of you!

1553322.content: You are a 25 year old stripper who was forced to get plastic surgery for her job.
1553322.title: A Different body type

15533221.content:
When the blackout suddenly found laying on a dirty bathroom floor. Slowly you opened your eyes getting up as you saw your reflection in the mirror. However it wasn't what you expected. It was your body, your normal male body staring at you with a sinister smile.

"It worked! I can't believe it worked!" Your male self said as you stared down to your own body seeing you were now inside your female dopplerganger.

"What the hell just happened?!" You cried out demanding an answer.

"That is my secret Evan dear, or should I say Eve, as I am Evan now." Your old body said with a laugh.

"Don't' worry I will treat your body well I have your memories now too. You really are a lucky guy I can't wait to live such a privileged life. I might check back in on you in the future, I am curious what you will look like after the procedure. Oh and have fun with that scumbag Max! Get used to a lot of ass grabbing!" She said as the mirror suddenly began to shift distort its image until your old male body faded away leaving just your new female reflection staring back at you....

You stared back at your reflection in shock. There you were your female counterpart. Your hair was the same dark brown but now shoulder length. You had a pair of modest breasts, probably large B cup or small C cup. Decent figure but nothing special.

Your head began to suddenly ache as more memories of Eve's life began pouring into you. You saw her troubled childhood was indeed true. However she was always very smart and clever but due to growing up both poor and a woman her options were very limited. Her dream as a child was always to be a famous dancer. She had taken many different types of dance lessons as a child. However as an adult she has had to make due with being a waitress and server as a high end strip club downtown in the city.

She had hopes of getting on stage one day herself. Show off her amazing dance skills and maybe build up a name for herself. Use the extra money to open her own dance studio. However the owner of the club, a guy named Max was a total scum bag and pervert. Just a week ago Eve had a meeting with him asking to go up on stage. Max laughed at her at told her no way. He said her tits were too small her figure too narrow. She was cute enough to get a man's attention but not nearly sexy enough for him to drop tips on her on stage.

This came as a crushing blow for Eve and seemed to be the last straw in her self confidence. She burst out in tears in the meeting begging Max for one chance. Max thought about it and pulled out a contract from his desk. He told her there was a "procedure" that could make her stage acceptable if she wanted, But it wasn't cheap. She would have to sign a year long "employment contract" where a portion of her salary would go to paying off the procedure and she was forbidden from quitting or getting another job until it was paid for. Forced with no other options Eve signed it....

The memories seemed to fade bringing you back. You realized now why she switched bodies with you now. She couldn't bare the idea of selling herself like this. You still had no idea how she managed to switch with you though. It seemed she was able to block that memory.

After a few minutes there was a sudden knock on the door as a woman was standing in your doorway. Using Eve's memories you recognized her as Candy, or at least that was her stage name. She was one of the strippers at the club. Her body was practically perfect. Huge round tits, long flowing hair, and a perfect hourglass figure. She was one of the most popular dancers at the club.

"Come on we are late. The Doctor doesn't like to be kept waiting." She said grabbing your hand as you found yourself being dragged out of your apartment.
15533221.title: Sounds good

155332211.content:
You found being almost dragged by Candy who took you downstairs and hailed a cab for the two of you. You could barely even say anything as she tossed you in the backseat of the car.

"Umm...I'm...not sure about this." You spoke up in your new softer voice. You new it was futile to explain you weren't exactly Eve but maybe you could get out of this and try to find away to reverse this body switch.

"Listen don't worry. I know it sounds scary but you will be fine. I had mine done about a year ago and I've heard it's gotten even easier since then." Candy said.

"No...its just, I've had a change of heart, I think maybe this isn't for me." You said trying to come up with a realistic way out of this.

"You already signed the agreement. Back out now and Max will own you....Trust me he will destroy your life if you run away now. My contract is almost up and I've made enough money to set myself up comfortably. Just do it and try to think of your next year as your wild and crazy phase. Your whole life is still ahead of you." Candy said from obvious years of experience.

You realized now how badly you were screwed. If you ran now any hopes of trying to establish control over this new body and life was gone, along with any hopes of trying to reverse it. If you went through with it you were signing yourself up for a year of stripping and exotic dancing, being the sex object for countless men to lear at. However at least this way you got to remain where you were and hopefully do some digging into just how Eve switched you to begin with.

With little other choice you sighed and nodded agreeing to go along with the original plan. You had to admit if you were going to be stuck being a woman at least being a sexier one sounded more preferable.

After a few minutes the two of you arrived at an office building and Candy took you inside. After signing in at the front deck an elevator took the two of you to a laboratory like room where an older man with white hair and a lab coat was waiting for you.

He looked up as the two of you entered as a small smile crossed his lips.

"Welcome back Candy, and you must be Eve. My name is Dr. Roberts." He said shaking your hand.

"Do you know why you are here Eve?" Dr. Roberts asked you.

"Umm....to become prettier?" You said not really sure what to say.

"Well I guess that's one to see it." Dr. Roberts said with a laugh.

"What we are going to do is. Series of injections that are going to restructure your genetic makeup.We inject you with millions of microscopic nano machines that reprogram your genetic code based on a design we create. This causes a much quicker and safer transformation. Compared to artificial surgeries, hair bleaching, tanning, nail extensions, etc." He explained.

"Is...it permanent?" You asked nervous.

"Well you always come in for more changes after a certain period of time...but yes the process doesn't naturally reserve itself." The Doctor explained.

"What....what will I like look?" You asked shaking a bit.

"Well that's up to whomever submitted the design. I believe it was your employer Mr. Maximus Lustin correct?" The Doctor replied.

You could see a table being prepped as several needles were being brought over as now was your last chance to submit or try and run.
155332211.title: The procedure.

choices: You overhear the doctor say something suspicious
1553322111.content:
You knew the consequences for leaving now were dire. You decided your best chance to beat this was to go along for now.

"If we are ready to begin, Eve could you stand over there we are going to take some stock photos." The doctor said pointing to a wall.

Taking a deep breath you nodded and stood over by the wall. You were wearing just an orange blouse and jeans with flip flops. Nothing to special so you just made a rather half hearted smile as they took your photo.

https://thumb9.shutterstock.com/display_...

"Thank you Eve, now please remove your clothing, we need to take a free nude shots to examine your body in detail." The doctor said.

"All the way?" You asked blushing.

"Yes please, remember I am just a doctor this is for the procedure." He said reassuring you.

You hadn't even seen your own body naked yet. You have definitely noticed the differences between being male and female but not to any real detail yet.

Sighing you slowly began to strip down as you tossed your clothes aside. While not ugly you noticed why Eve felt so self conscious. Her butt was flat and her breasts were rather small and not totally even shaped. Her legs had clear razor stuble and her public hair needed a serious trim. She reminded you of this quiet girl you knew back in high school that once asked you out and you rejected her. The irony was starting to hit you that were actually talking about yourself now....

"Thank you Eve. Now please join us over here." The Doctor said as he escorted you to a long table.

"Please lay down and try to relax." He said helping you lay down comfortably.

The table was a bit cold on your bare skin but had nice head rests and padding on it. As you laid down the doctor suddenly reached over and grabbed some straps and wrapped them around your wrists and ankles, tying you to the table.

"Umm...what's going on?" You said getting nervous.

"This is just for your own protection. The process can be a jarring at times we can't have you squirming around too much. Just try to relax. The doctor said.

Taking deep breaths you were getting more and more nervous as they brought the needles over. You always hated getting shots as a kid.

"We are going to start nice and small. This injection will stimulate hair growth and color follicles." The doctor said grabbing the first needle.

The doctor injected you right above the temple which stung a bit as you felt your head beginning to tingle. It didn't take long to feel your hair beginning to get longer as it passed down your shoulders hitting your mid back. You could also see the color beginning to lighten. It was getting brighter and was soon was a nice shade of blonde. It kept lightening until it was a bright platinum blonde.

"Wow....I didn't think it was going to be that fast." You said surprised.

"I know it's fascinating right?" The doctor said as they brought over the other needles.

These next series of injections will complete the transformation. It will rework your skin tone, body hair, body structure. Everything. You may experience some discomfort during this stage." The doctor said.

The doctor proceeded by injecting a serious if shots into your feet, legs, abdomen, chest, and arms. Almost every major part of your body.
1553322111.title: Go through with it
